Isaac Chukwu Udeh (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1997) onye a maara dịka Chukwu onye na-ese ihe bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe. A maara ya maka eserese azụ ya ma gosipụta ya na Ghana Banking Awards na 2016 na 2017. E kpughere ihe ngosi nka ya na MTN Heroes of Change 2019. A maara ya maka eserese ụtụ ya maka onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN Kofi Annan, Kobe Bryant na Gianna Bryant.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Wesley Grammar School na Accra
Ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Alpha Beta Educational Center
Maka agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Takoradi Technical University ebe ọ gụrụ eserese azụmahịa.

A nabatara ya na EMY Awards Africa, Ghana Edition.  A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na GUBA Awards 2019. O nwetara ihe nrite na ihe nrite ego site na MTN Heroes of Change 2019 mgbe ekpughere onye mmeri maka ihe omume ahụ.
